name: Remnant (Delpire)
description:
Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #52. You are a new ghost in purgatory looking to make your way to the afterlife. Meet your fellow ghosts, journey into the dangerous temple, and trade the goods you fine.

Controls
  • Move - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Interace - E or Spacebar or Enter
  • Show in game menu - Tab (or click the gear icon in the top right)
Theme

I used all three wild cards in this entry.

Created By

Uses Godot 3.5 mono build.
